## Matrix4x4.getFarPlane() method

Get far clip plane.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getFarPlane(): number;
```
**Returns:**

number

The far clip plane

## Remarks

This method assumes that this is a projection matrix (perspective or orthogonal).
